[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”Meet the ClinLab Staffing Team” module_class=”page-hero-template” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ title_font=”|700||on|||||” title_text_align=”center” title_text_color=”#29295b” title_font_size=”40px” subhead_text_align=”center” subhead_text_color=”#777e84″ subhead_font_size=”15px” background_enable_color=”off” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(255,255,255,0)” background_color_gradient_end=”#ffffff” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”https://clinlabstaffing.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/armchairs-blur-business-296883.jpg” custom_padding=”165px||165px||true|false” title_font_size_tablet=”” title_font_size_phone=”30px” title_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop”][/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”section” module_class=”our-team-container” _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_team_member name=”Andrius Montvila” position=”Founder & CEO” image_url=”https://clinlabstaffing.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Andrius_Montvila_President_CEO-1.jpg” linkedin_url=”https://www.linkedin.com/in/andrius-montvila-b9178b1″ admin_label=”Andrius” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ header_font=”||||||||” header_line_height=”1.2em” position_font=”||||||||” position_font_size=”16px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” use_border_color=”off”]

Andrius has been in the staffing industry for almost 20 years, starting as a personal contributor during the economic boom of the late 90s, when he quickly…more

Jim started his staffing career in 2006, when he started as an Entry Level Recruiter with ClinLab Staffing. After quickly establishing himself…more

Mark joined the firm in October of 2017. Prior to this engagement, he worked with several different clients in a …more

Alison started her career with ClinLab Staffing in 2011.  After graduating from Nichols College with a degree in Business Administration in 2010…more

[/et_pb_team_member][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_team_member name=”Adam Katz” position=”Managing Director of Recruiting” image_url=”https://clinlabstaffing.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Adam_Katz_Managing_Director_Recruiting.jpg” linkedin_url=”https://www.linkedin.com/in/adamkatz” admin_label=”Adam” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” use_border_color=”off”]

Adam joined ClinLab Staffing in 2009 as an Entry-Level Recruiter.  Within his first year, he became the top billing recruiter in the company…more

Steve has been in the staffing industry for more than ten years and has experience recruiting for a wide array of industries… more
